title: What is a Blockchain?
subtitle: The foundation of Web3.
description: This video provides a simple, clear explanation of what a blockchain is, how it works, and why it's a revolutionary technology. Perfect for absolute beginners.

title: What is Cryptocurrency?
subtitle: Understanding digital money.
description: Learn about the basics of cryptocurrency, from Bitcoin to altcoins. This lesson covers how they are created, stored, and used in the digital economy.

title: What are NFTs?
subtitle: Exploring digital ownership.
description: Dive into the world of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). Understand what they are, how they work, and their impact on art, gaming, and digital identity.

title: Introduction to Solana
subtitle: Learn about high-speed blockchain.
description: Get a quick introduction to Solana, a blockchain known for its incredible speed and low transaction costs. Discover what makes it different from other networks.

title: The Solana Ecosystem
subtitle: Discover dApps and projects.
description: Explore the vibrant ecosystem of decentralized applications (dApps) built on Solana, from DeFi protocols to NFT marketplaces.

title: Setting Up a Solana Wallet
subtitle: Your gateway to the Solana ecosystem.
description: A step-by-step guide to setting up your first Solana wallet, like Phantom or Solflare, so you can start interacting with the ecosystem.

title: What is DeFi?
subtitle: Introduction to Decentralized Finance.
description: An overview of Decentralized Finance (DeFi), explaining how it aims to build a new financial system on the blockchain, open to everyone.

title: Lending & Borrowing in DeFi
subtitle: Become your own bank.
description: Learn how you can earn interest on your crypto by lending it out, or take out loans without a middleman, through DeFi protocols.

title: Intro to Smart Contracts
subtitle: Code that executes itself.
description: Understand the fundamentals of smart contracts, the self-executing programs that are the backbone of dApps and DeFi.

title: Solidity for Beginners
subtitle: The language of Ethereum.
description: Get started with Solidity, the most popular programming language for writing smart contracts on Ethereum and other compatible blockchains.
